attributes.action: To ban secondary ticketing websites such as GetMeIn! And Stubhub
attributes.additional_details: I recently tried to get tickets for The streets as they were 50 pound I thought it would be worth it however I found myself paying 100 pound for exactly the same ticket that was 50 to these fraudsters. I refused to pay this 100 pound.
attributes.background: As I go to gigs a lot I obviously always need tickets which is often impossible because of websites like Stubhub and GetMeIn. One minute after the tickets have become available to public they are double the price on websites like this.These websites should be banned so fans can get tickets fairly.
